user.title: Define your Phoenix EV Charger modbus connection

data.host: The ip-address of your Phoenix EV charger modbus device
data.port: The TCP port on which to connect to the Phoenix EV charger
data.device_model: The Phoenix EV charger hardware model (Until now, only EV-CC-AC1-M3-xx types are supported)
data.name: The prefix to be used for your Phoenix EV charger sensors
data.scan_interval: The polling frequency of the modbus registers in seconds
